fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path of the logo for the bank statement

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: The period for which this bank statement covers

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: The unique identifier for the account in question

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the individual or entity holding the account

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address of the account holder

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: The balance at the start of the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_count
fields.description: Number of deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount deposited during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_count
fields.description: Number of withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount withdrawn during the statement period

fields.name: summary.transactions_count
fields.description: Total number of transactions made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: The balance at the end of the statement period

fields.name: deposit.date
fields.description: Date when a deposit was made

fields.name: deposit.description
fields.description: Description or reason for the deposit

fields.name: deposit.amount
fields.description: Amount deposited on the given date

fields.name: withdrawal.date
fields.description: Date when a withdrawal was made

fields.name: withdrawal.description
fields.description: Description or reason for the withdrawal

fields.name: withdrawal.amount
fields.description: Amount withdrawn on the given date

fields.name: balance.date
fields.description: Date when a balance was checked or updated

fields.name: balance.amount
fields.description: The balance at the specified date
